title: The Start
body:
This is the first signal.

I hope you are out there.

title: Cosmos
body:
Love with me tender
amuck amongst the cosmos
drift with me endless

title: I love you so
body:
a love incarnate
boundless in all that you are
run free, wildflower

title: Don't let time tick
body:
look me in the eyes
until tomorrow's today
don't look at the time

title: remember me
body:
should i die before you,
when i am buried beneath this earth
and insects feast on my flesh
they will taste the love i had for you,
so pure it taints the i am sealed in.
they will look for it in every meal thereafter
they'll wander the earth
looking for you, my love reborn, anew
so when an insect approaches you,
when they sting your skin, in search of the nectar they crave
as i did you
remember me.

title: void
body:
forgotten, all sound
I'd still remember your voice.
Tell me you love me.
